body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->

/kind bug
/sig cli
/area kubectl

**What happened**:
```
$ kubectl -n kube-system describe statefulsets csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner | grep Replicas
Replicas:           824635951880 desired | 1 total
```

**What you expected to happen**:
Should only be one desired replica
```
$ kubectl -n kube-system get statefulsets csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner 
NAME                           DESIRED   CURRENT   AGE
csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner   1         1         3h24m
```

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

**Anything else we need to know?**:
Right here
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/89558579982559eff2006337820b16802fc7fd5a/pkg/kubectl/describe/versioned/describe.go#L2962

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.1", GitCommit:"eec55b9ba98609a46fee712359c7b5b365bdd920", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-12-13T10:39:04Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12", GitVersion:"v1.12.3", GitCommit:"435f92c719f279a3a67808c80521ea17d5715c66", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-11-26T12:46:57Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: Describe statefulset does not dereference number of replicas
